snippet: Detroit’s Jose Valverde blew a four-run lead in the ninth inning Saturday in Game 1 of the A.L.C.S. at Yankee Stadium.
abstract: Struggles continues for Detroit Tigers pitcher Jose Valverde, blowing a four-run lead in the ninth inning in Game 1 of American League Championship Series against New York Yankees.
lead_paragraph: Detroit’s Jose Valverde blew a four-run lead in the ninth inning Saturday in Game 1 of the A.L.C.S. at Yankee Stadium.

headline.main: Valverde’s Struggles Continue With a Collapse
headline.print_headline: Valverde’s Struggles Continue With a Collapse
